code: import axios from"@helpers/axios/private.axios";import{ALERT,WALLET}from"../../constants";export const transfer=_ref=>{let{amount,from,to}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{try{const resp=await axios.post("/wallet/transfer-balance",{amount,wallet_type_from:from,wallet_type_to:to});dispatch({type:WALLET.HIDE_TRANSFER_POPUP});dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:resp.data.message});return resp;}catch(error){dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_ERROR,payload:error.response.data.message});}};};
